thi-ap28:11.2: pacchimo vattate vayo → pacchimā vattayi vayā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | pacchimo vattati vayo (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap28:15.3: Aparādhamajānantī → aparādhaṃ pajānanti (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap28:24.1: Kāmadhātumatikkamma → kāmadhātumatikkantā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
thi-ap28:25.4: dassayī → buddhānuññā yasodharā. (bj) | ... dassayi (sya1ed, sya2ed) | ... iddhiṃ vidaṃsayiṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap28:56.1: Cirānugataṃ dayitaṃ → cirānupari āsīnaṃ (bj) | cirānugataṃ dassitaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap28:67.1: Tassa te → tassa taṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap28:76.4: dvādasa koṭiyo → honti lokagganāyakā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | paññākoṭisatāni ca (pts-vp-pli1ed)
